abstract: Exponential is a prime candidate, but the chief executive says, “no thank you.”
snippet: Exponential is a prime candidate, but the chief executive says, “no thank you.”
lead_paragraph: It’s become a virtual arms race in the online advertising world as Google, Yahoo, Microsoft and ad conglomerates like the WPP Group and Publicis Groupe buy up just about any company that puts “online” and “advertising” in their corporate description.

headline.main: Online Advertising: What’s Left to Buy?
